title: want to climb out of bronze again -.-
body:
was a gold player in s4! now im stuck in bronze due to losing many ranked placement matches :( looking to duo out! im support main so would be good if someone can ad bot with me and we can skype! i can also play other roles.

In order from my prefered

Support
Jungle
Top
Mid
ADC

replies.body: Bribe me, and I will help you to climb out of Bronze {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

> [{quoted}](name=ciaô,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=yxNOMjWi,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-14T13:34:13.543+0000)
>
> nty

buy me Taliyah Skin ? if I make u go to silver again ? wht rank are you right now

> [{quoted}](name=GBG727,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=yxNOMjWi,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-14T14:16:14.763+0000)
>
> buy me Taliyah Skin ? if I make u go to silver again ? wht rank are you right now

lol if you get me out ill buy you 2 skins

> [{quoted}](name=ciaô,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=yxNOMjWi,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T03:20:03.472+0000)
>
> lol if you get me out ill buy you 2 skins

lol I just need 1, ooh wait yeah 2 is better both Taliyah skin <3 in this account and my other small as well, 

i will start playing from next week Thursday night, will inform u dw
Add me if you like i will play with you when im online
Wouldn't you be able to climb out of bronze if you were s4 gold? Oh and is there a pref of a certain ADC u want? I can play other roles equally good if I'm needed to fill.

> [{quoted}](name=Chobi,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=yxNOMjWi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-13T19:21:28.221+0000)
>
> Wouldn't you be able to climb out of bronze if you were s4 gold? Oh and is there a pref of a certain ADC u want? I can play other roles equally good if I'm needed to fill.

any is good! i work pretty good with all adc! i like ez, jhin, jinx, corki, ashe most

i just got demoted to B1 from silver due to some bad players, ill help you if you help me man
top
mid
sup
adc 
in that order
If ur interested in an arc main smurfing in bronze 4 that would be great add me if interested ill ad you back. 4rtificialalpha i have quite a big adc champ pool
me and 2 mates are trying to climb if u wanna join
